title: Bandicam v2.0.3.674 Final by KpoJIuK [2014,MlRus]
description:
System requirements:
Windows 2000, 2003, XP, Vista, 7/8 / 8.1 (Support for 32-bit / 64-bit)
Bandicam allows you to record a certain area on a PC screen, or in a program that uses graphics technology DirectX / OpenGL. Bandicam will help you carry out a video with a high compression ratio, while maintaining the video quality closer to the original work, and provides performance far superior to other programs that have similar features.
You can record Minecraft, WOW, MapleStory, iTunes, YouTube, PowerPoint, Excel, Firefox, HDTV, Web camera, Skype, Video chatting, Java / Flash-games, streaming video and screen area.
